title: The foldable Royole FlexPai has a way to go
description: The Royole Flexpai is officially the worlds first foldable phone, but its maker has achieved the feat by rushing the device out to market before its ready. The threat of Samsung and Huawei stealing the small companys thunder was simply too much to resist, and thats how we ended up with the unfinished, unpolished Flexpai at CES 2019.
